QuestData.Title: Hunting Zul
QuestData.Description: Zul is pulling all of his forces back to his stronghold at the Temple of the Prophet.$b$bRastakhan has sent word that he is marshalling an army in the Zocalo with anyone still loyal that can carry a weapon. Looks like the old king had more loyalists than Zul expected.$b$bThat, and he has three of their eldest loa gathered to his side.$b$bGo and lend your strength to their army.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet King Rastakhan at the Zocalo.
